channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Senators grill Trump's nominee for Fed amid alarms over central bank independence

item.title: Why the medical community is thrilled by U.S. support for a 'breakthrough' HIV drug
item.description: Lenacapavir has the potential to end the HIV epidemic, researchers say. The Trump administration says backing this kind of effort will be a model for ...

item.title: A clash of the comebacks: Osaka and Anisimova face off in the U.S. Open semifinals

item.title: Senators from both parties grilled RFK Jr. on vaccines and more

item.title: Experiencing pain? Sanjay Gupta explains why 'It Doesn't Have to Hurt'
item.description: Gupta's new book examines the world of pain — why we feel it, and how we can treat it. He says distraction and meditation can be useful tools for mana...

item.title: Watch: Key moments from RFK Jr's heated Senate hearing
item.description: Robert F Kennedy Jr faced questions on Covid deaths, vaccines and his record as the US health secretary during an often contentious hearing.

item.title: What's next for Trump's funding battle with Harvard?

item.title: Gregory Bovino, head of Los Angeles campaign, shows how immigration agents rack up arrests

item.description: Most Americans say kids should be vaccinated to attend school. But as Florida plans to become the first state to eliminate childhood vaccine mandates,...

item.title: Where states stand in the battle for partisan advantage in US House redistricting maps
Who are the victims of the Lisbon funicular cable crash?
item.description: Four employees of a non-profit organisation and a transport worker are among those who died.

item.title: Feds scrap proposal to offer cash to air passengers for flight disruptions
item.description: Transportation Department drops Biden-era proposal to require airlines to financially compensate passengers for flight disruptions.

item.title: RFK Jr. denies pressuring ousted CDC director to preapprove vaccine changes
item.description: Health and Human Services Secretary Robert F. Kennedy denied pressuring the ousted CDC director to preapprove vaccine recommendations.

item.title: What we know about Lisbon's deadly funicular crash
item.description: At least 16 people died after a carriage on the city's famous Glória hillside railway derailed.

item.title: One killed and at least six injured in mass stabbing in Canada
item.description: The suspected attacker also died in the incident in Hollow Water First Nation, north of Winnipeg, police say.

item.title: Boy, 3, pulled from funicular crash that has shocked Portugal
item.description: It is unclear what caused the crash in which 16 people died and more than 20 were injured, including many foreign nationals.
